description: From neighbor +‎ -ship. Cognate with Dutch nabuurschap (“neighborship”), Low German Naberschaft (“neighborhood; neighborship”), German Nachbarschaft (“neighborship”), Swedish naboskap (“neighborship”).

entries.meaning: The state or condition of being neighbors; a community, connection, or relationship between or among people and/or things which is based simply on living close geographically.
A community, connection, or relationship between or among people and/or things which is based simply on being of a similar class.
